name: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West - Pigsy's Perfect 10
name_original: Enslaved: Odyssey to the West - Pigsy's Perfect 10
description:
Enslaved: Odyssey to the West - Pigsy's Perfect 10 is an action game developed by Ninja Theory. It was originally released in 2010. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Enslaved: Odyssey to the West - Pigsy's Perfect 10 has a score of 74. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Enslaved: Odyssey to the West - Pigsy's Perfect 10 on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
